action_modal.details: For bookings made on or after April 6, 2020, be sure to consider the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) and associated government measures. If you don’t book a flexible rate, you may not be entitled to a refund. Your cancellation request will be handled by the property, based on your chosen policy and consumer law where applicable. During times of uncertainty, we recommend booking an option with free cancellation. If your plans change, you can cancel free of charge until free cancellation expires.
action_modal.title: Check your booking conditions

banner.subtitle: We recommend booking an option with free cancellation in case your travel plans change.
banner.title: As of April 6, 2020, your chosen cancellation policy will apply, regardless of the coronavirus.

hotel_name: Sedona Suites Ho Chi Minh City

hotel_text.important_information:
Please be informed that the property will pre-authorize your credit card for one-night room charge at least 7 days prior to arrival for guarantee purposes.

Please note that hotel may contact the cardholder for verification purpose.

Please present the same credit card used to guarantee your booking when checking in / making payment at the hotel. The name on the credit card used for the booking must correspond to the guest staying at the property. Guests are required to show a photo identification (driving license, passport, ID card) upon check-in.

All guests staying at the property must register the full name before arrival or at the latest during the check-in time. The guests’ name cannot be modified during their stay. The property may contact you after you book to provide instructions.

Please inform Sedona Suites Ho Chi Minh City in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Guests are required to show a photo ID and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

policies.content: You can cancel free of charge until 1 day before arrival. You'll be charged the total price of the reservation if you cancel within 1 day before arrival.

All children are welcome. One child under 3 years stays free of charge in a crib.
One child under 6 years stays free of charge when using existing beds.
One child from 6 to 13 years is charged VND 201000  per night when using existing beds.
One older child or adult is charged VND 1040000  per night in an extra bed.
The maximum number of extra beds in a room is 1.
The maximum number of total guests in a room is 6.
The maximum number of cribs in a room is 1.
Any type of extra bed or crib is upon request and needs to be confirmed by management.
Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
WiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge.
Private parking is available on site (reservation is needed) and charges may apply.
The property reserves the right to pre-authorize credit cards prior to arrival.
10 % VAT is included. A City tax is not applicable. A Service charge is not applicable.
items: A City tax is not applicable.
A Service charge is not applicable.

messages: Check for travel restrictions. Travel might only be permitted for certain purposes, and touristic travel in particular may not be allowed.
info_banners.title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) support
